project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves and displays the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Create function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the received data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a command-line interface to input the city name
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, and weather conditions)
Write tests for each implemented feature above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
